body_html: Thanks a lot for the PR @Erotemic! Yes, I think the torch.device is an addition that fixes most of the issues that XPU were aiming to resolve. I think the DataParallel part is not too bad to have as an if or a helper function in user code.
body_text: Thanks a lot for the PR @Erotemic! Yes, I think the torch.device is an addition that fixes most of the issues that XPU were aiming to resolve. I think the DataParallel part is not too bad to have as an if or a helper function in user code.
body: Thanks a lot for the PR @Erotemic! Yes, I think the `torch.device` is an addition that fixes most of the issues that `XPU` were aiming to resolve. I think the `DataParallel` part is not too bad to have as an `if` or a helper function in user code.
